item.description: Mathematics for grade 1- O/L, Cambridge, Edexcel, OCR and Local by a Lecturer of State University of Srilanka who holds BSc. (1st class hons) & MSc with years of teaching experience. Currently the Tutor is in United Kingdom and conduct online individual classes.The Theory will be covered with gradual comprehensions & series of evaluation papers where the student do not need to struggle with extreme studies immidiately before the Exams.Special attention for the weak students who frustrate with Mathematics.The class is consisted of Theory, Revision & Past papers. The student will gradually expose to hard questions. Specially for the checkpoint , keystage exams and O/L candidates can prepare for the exam from the beginning with the basics. Thus the Revisions & the Past paper sessions will be done & paper marking also will be done by the Lecturer her self & the marks will be given.Mathematics is a practical subject with less theory & high amount of applications. There you need to do considerable amount of comprehensions. That will be covered by this class.Individual classes, or small group classes can be arranged according to the preference of the students. In individual classes the 100% attention would be there to the particular student.Join us for an international level of preparation for your examsPlease contact only through WhatsApp as the Tutor is in UK

item.description: ðŸ”¸ Iâ€™m an English Teacher.ðŸ”¸ I am also a BSc(Hons) Graduate and an English Diploma holder.ðŸ”¸ Teach your child English, with simple step-by-step no matter what level they are at.ðŸ”¸ I will teach "Active Voice" all 12 Tenses (Grammar) very easily manner. In addition, "Passive Voice" will also be discussed.ðŸ”¸ All Pupil's Book and Workbook units will also be discussed.ðŸ”¸ G.C.E O/L Past Papers, Term Papers and Model Papers will be discussed with students.ðŸ”¸ Additional attention is also given in writing essays.ðŸ”¸ Dictation will also be given as Homework.ðŸ”¸ Reading & Writing will be done as Homework.ðŸ”¸ I will give access to my "Digital Library" to gain additional knowledge of Vocabulary, Grammar and Spoken English.ðŸ”¸ By only studying â€œDigital Libraryâ€, You can get an "A" Pass for O/L. It's that much rich in content.ðŸ”¸ I will also improve Speaking English skills of students.ðŸ”¸ So far, I have received very positive feedback from my students.ðŸ”¸ Can participate for the class on
